1.name: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are developmentally on track in health, learning and psychosocial well-being, by sex

2.name: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex

4.name: Net Rate of Coverage for Pre-Primary Education Programs (ISCED 02)

5.name: Number of years of (a) free and (b) compulsory pre-primary education guaranteed in legal frameworks

6.name: Proportion of children and young people (a) in Grade 2 or 3; (b) at the end of primary education; and (c) at the end of lower secondary education achieving at least a minimum proficiency level in (i) reading and (ii) mathematics, by sex

7.name: Proportion of population in a given age group achieving at least a fixed level of proficiency in functional (a) literacy and (b) numeracy skills, by sex

8.name: Net rate of admission to primary, lower secondary and upper secondary

9.name: Gross intake ratio to the last grade (primary, lower secondary)

10.name: Completion rate (primary education, lower secondary education, upper secondary education)

11.name: Out-of-school rate (primary education, lower secondary education, upper secondary education)
